title: Sample Blog Post 1
content:
# Sample Blog Post 1

This is a sample blog post created from JSON import.

## Features

- **Markdown support**

- [Links](https://example.com)
- Lists and more

## Code Example

excerpt: This is a sample blog post created from JSON import with full markdown support.
